医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
延时图像显示镁离子如何协调 CRISPR-Cas9 中的双链断裂被称为 CRISPR 的基因编辑技术给农业、健康研究等领域带来了革命性的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Time-lapsed-images-show-how-magnesium-ions-coordinate-double-stranded-breaks-in-CRISPR-Cas9.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Time-lapsed-images-show-how-magnesium-ions-coordinate-double-stranded-breaks-in-CRISPR-Cas9.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31360dc3-7a15-490f-99a9-c76992477d18 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 23:57:35 -0400 Time-lapsed images show how magnesium ions coordinate double-stranded breaks in CRISPR-Cas9
改变肠道微生物群可以改善高血压肾损伤和炎症对啮齿动物的新研究表明，改变肠道微生物可能会影响与高血压相关的器官损伤的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Modifying-the-gut-microbiota-can-ameliorate-hypertential-kidney-damage-and-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Modifying-the-gut-microbiota-can-ameliorate-hypertential-kidney-damage-and-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=156d9634-ba04-4009-9aad-db3fae34dffa Thu, 02 Nov 2023 23:51:55 -0400 Modifying the gut microbiota can ameliorate hypertensive kidney damage and inflammation
平衡行为：在不影响营养的情况下应对过敏儿童的消除饮食最近的研究强调了对食物过敏儿童仔细管理消除饮食、确保营养平衡和支持生长的重要性。该研究提倡采用多学科方法来帮助儿童避免过敏原，而不损害他们的整体健康和发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Balancing-act-Navigating-elimination-diets-in-allergic-kids-without-compromising-nutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Balancing-act-Navigating-elimination-diets-in-allergic-kids-without-compromising-nutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d11e72a0-10ff-4758-b6ae-069f57e8ae8c Thu, 02 Nov 2023 23:24:00 -0400 Balancing act: Navigating elimination diets in allergic kids without compromising nutrition
研究强调 SGLT2i 在糖尿病和癌症患者中的安全性问题钠-葡萄糖协同转运蛋白 2 抑制剂 (SGLT2i) 对患有或不患有糖尿病的患者具有与心脏和肾脏相关的益处，其益处超出了最初的降低血糖水平的适应症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-highlights-safety-concerns-of-SGLT2i-in-病人-with-diabetes-and-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-highlights-safety-concerns-of-SGLT2i-in-病人-with-diabetes-and-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1366ab2-b44c-48e5-a4bd-7fb5de90652f Thu, 02 Nov 2023 23:21:11 -0400 Study highlights safety concerns of SGLT2i in patients with diabetes and cancer
鲨鱼皮肤粘液显示出生物医学应用的潜力根据有关鲨鱼在野外受伤后康复的报道，鲨鱼在很多方面与其他鱼类不同，其中包括明显显着的伤口愈合能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Shark-skin-mucus-shows-potential-for-biomedical-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Shark-skin-mucus-shows-potential-for-biomedical-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37c94890-9d40-4714-8372-ae1eadf4e628 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 23:12:29 -0400 Shark skin mucus shows potential for biomedical applications
自我民族志研究探索人工智能工具在无障碍方面的实用性生成式人工智能工具，如 ChatGPT（一种人工智能驱动的语言工具）和 Midjourney（一种人工智能驱动的图像生成器），可以为各种残疾人士提供潜在帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Autoethnograph-study-explores-utility-of-AI-tools-for-accessibility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Autoethnograph-study-explores-utility-of-AI-tools-for-accessibility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1036eff0-5968-4cc8-b3a9-1087106d4b71 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 22:57:00 -0400 Autoethnographic study explores utility of AI tools for accessibility
研究表明大量使用手机会降低精子数量瑞士的研究发现，年轻男性使用手机的频率较高，精子数量和浓度较低，这引发了人们对射频电磁场暴露对男性生殖健康影响的担忧。尽管存在局限性，但该研究表明，随着手机使用量的增加，生育能力存在潜在风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-links-heavy-mobile-phone-use-to-lower-sperm-count.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-links-heavy-mobile-phone-use-to-lower-sperm-count.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03d56607-0f91-490c-94d5-787152360cd8 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 22:52:00 -0400 Study links heavy mobile phone use to lower sperm count
研究揭示甲醛如何通过表观遗传学改变基因表达表观遗传学是控制基因活性的化学机制，使我们的细胞、组织和器官能够适应周围环境的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-reveals-how-formogenic-alters-gene-express-through-epigenics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Study-reveals-how-formogenic-alters-gene-express-through-epigenics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ad14295-73de-47aa-945f-e0e3888a9866 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 22:32:24 -0400 Study reveals how formaldehyde alters gene expression through epigenetics
从森林到餐桌：研究揭示野外的营养强国研究人员发现，纽约州锡拉丘兹的可采食植物具有与商业食品相当或更好的营养价值，特别是富含抗氧化剂的野生水果、蔬菜和草药。这些发现表明，野生植物对于解决粮食不安全的城市地区的营养缺乏问题至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/From-the-forest-to-the-table-Study-reveals-nutritional-powerhouses-in-the-wild.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/From-the-forest-to-the-table-Study-reveals-nutritional-powerhouses-in-the-wild.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d51461c1-7644-4ac7-a121-274f0c4ef889 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 22:08:00 -0400 From the forest to the table: Study reveals nutritional powerhouses in the wild
基因发现揭示卵巢发育弗朗西斯·克里克研究所和蔚蓝海岸大学的研究人员与法国和瑞士的其他实验室一起，发现了一种基因，它是小鼠卵巢发育的早期决定因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Gene-discovery-sheds-light-on-ovary-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Gene-discovery-sheds-light-on-ovary-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=726047ac-0e91-4e54-9ef4-29b9e619fba3 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 22:01:53 -0400 Gene discovery sheds light on ovary development
